verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mimi ndimi mzabibu
wa kweli,
naye Baba yangu
ndiye mkulima.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tawi lizaalo hulisafisha
lipate kuzaa zaidi.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kama mtu hakai
ndani yangu,
atatupwa nje na kukauka.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kama mkizaa
matunda mengi,
Baba yangu
anatukuzwa sana.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Adumuye ndani
yangu daima,
atapewa yote
aniombayo.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ashikaye yote
niliyosema,
atadumu katika
pendo langu.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Niliwaambieni
mambo hayo,
ili furaha yangu
iwe nanyi.
